divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2:00a.m.on oct 14 just outside Cedar Rapids IA my wife and I both became speechless. A bright ball of light caught our eyes way up in the sky. As we drove it moved rapidly straight down towards the ground. Just before it reached the ground it flashed brightly and then disappeared. As we continued to drive we both tried to explain what we seen but could'nt.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Cedar Rapids
There were no other sightings in Cedar Rapids on or around October 14th 2010
